title: RIOT PLEASE HELP ( FREE JINX SKIN) ITS A HACK PLZ RIOT THIS NEEDS URGENT ATTENTION !!!!!!!!!!
body:
OKAY WHAT THE FUCK ( sorry for swearing ) but omfg guys what ever you do do not do the free jinx skin its fake its a acc hacking bot me and over 10 my mates were like daum free skin a hour later all 10 of us had our accs hacked icon set to first icon unlocked all our ip and rp used so IM TELLING YOU THE FREE JINX THING ISNT REAL if you like playing lol and like your acc DO NOT put in for the skin my mate lost over 10k rp that he was saving up for new skins with this person needs to be caught and riot plz find out who it is and in total my mates and i have all lost a combined total of 18750 rp i mean the post says its posted BY RIOT KAYLE we all cheacked no body in oce is under that name so RIOT someone is using a hack using a FAKE RIOT name to act liek the post is real  after my first acc got hacked i went onto my second on and got these messages 

**[LINK + CHAT REMOVED]**

RIOT IF YOU DONT TAKE THAT PAGE DOWN PEOPLE ARE GONNA START GETTING PISSED OFF ALOT ITS UNDER A FAKE RIOTER NAME ( RIOT KAYLE )
AND THERE USING IT TO STEAL PEOPLE'S ACCOUNTS AND SELL THEM FOR MONEY NOW RIOT YOU HAVE TO READ THIS

replies.body: Or you could not be a complete idiot by giving away your log-in details...
yeah usually if it sounds too good to be true, it definitely is.

Firstly, you cant apologize for swearing when you can easily backspace those words before posting. No forgiveness there (and I hope you get punished for thinking you'd get some). 

Secondly, it was probably made clear in the terms and conditions that you are not to divulge your information to anyone else, as you are the sole person responsible for your account. Sharing account details is never permitted on any platform, and in almost every circumstance where a malicious user ends up on the account, the owner of the account must take the blame.
This
why would you believe such an idiotic fucking url and give your password?
This
If it's free. Then it's definitely not free!

Why did you think you were getting a free skin? 
Why would you enter in your details ? 
Why we're you searching for free skins? Why not simply buy them?
i wasnt searching my mate sent me the link
OMG!! That's what happen to also!!!

Wat. What the actual eff lol??

"Oh hey mum!! You got league? That's awesome! Ermergerd a free skin!? Just enter my log in deetz? Okay!"

It doesn't let you cancel login, and if you just press login with only your username, it applies. 
So much for free skin.

If you have any more information, please send it to Riot Games Player Support and they can investigate further!

My god, how many times has riot told you peoople its fake, its your own fault... [do this to recover it](http://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and select recovering account... fill it out. Riot will look into the problem, then you need to go change your password.

And as a side note, riot gives nothing for free. If the link doesn't have .LeagefoLegends or .riotgames in it, its 99% of the time fake
this just happened to me i only have like 60 rp rn anyway lol
You got scammed.

this is retarded idk how you can fall for that lol its like in old runescape days with them fake runescape websites only dumbasses with no brains fall for things like this im sorry you deserved to lose whatever you lost hopefully will teach you not to be so dumb
